about_the_game:
New Giant Merchant is based on the real world, in the overhead world environment, in order to become a giant merchant as the goal, to start the journey of MMORPG.

In addition to the traditional MMORPG training, playing monster elements, mainly in the role of similar businessmen, trading between continents, "buy low and sell high" business behavior to carry out the whole game.

The battle of the game is to use mercenaries to fight RTS. In the middle and later stages, it can invest in Chamber of Commerce towns and conquer the city pools to gain profits.

There are three forces in the game: Dongying, Western Regions and Nordic, six distinctive protagonists and 21 mercenaries with unique skills.

The game world is a real world terrain based on satellite maps, totaling more than 300 towns.

More than 200 hostile monsters of different styles

There are nearly a thousand kinds of practical commodities that can be used for investment and trading, all of which can be used for the manufacture of combat equipment and consumables.
